analysis.key_quote: This proposed rule is a solution in search of a problem. It does not promote accountability; it undermines it. It does not safeguard democracy; it weakens one of its cornerstones: a professional, nonpartisan civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based protections and due process rights for federal employees, as well as the risks of politicization in civil service roles.
